ElementDescription: The NDAR Global Unique Identifier (GUID) for research subject
Subject ID how it's defined in lab/project
Date on which the interview/genetic test/sampling/imaging/biospecimen was completed. MM/DD/YYYY
Age in months at the time of the interview/test/sampling/imaging.
Notes: Age is rounded to chronological month. If the research participant is 15-days-old at time of interview, the appropriate value would be 0 months. If the participant is 16-days-old, the value would be 1 month.

ElementDescription: Sex of subject at birth
Notes: M = Male; F = Female; O=Other; NR = Not reported

ElementDescription: How frequently have you experienced pain
Notes: 0=Never; 1=Almost some of the days; 2=Some of the days; 3=Almost half of the days; 4=About half of the days; 5=Almost most of the days; 6=Most of the days; 7=Almost every day; 8=Every day

ElementDescription: How would rate the intensity of your pain
Notes: 0=No pain; 1=None to mild pain; 2=Mild pain; 3=Mild to moderate pain; 4=Moderate pain; 5=Moderate to severe pain; 6=Severe pain; 7=Severe to unbearable pain; 8=Unbearable pain

ElementDescription: How much did pain interfere with your daily life
Notes: 0=Never; 1=Almost some of the days; 2=Some of the days; 3=Almost half of the days; 4=About half of the days; 5=Almost most of the days; 6=Most of the days; 7=Almost every day; 8=Every day

ElementDescription: How often did you use medication or other treatment
Notes: 0=Never; 1=Almost some of the days; 2=Some of the days; 3=Almost half of the days; 4=About half of the days; 5=Almost most of the days; 6=Most of the days; 7=Almost every day; 8=Every day

ElementDescription: Indicate where pain is
Other pain to specify
Indicate where pain is - Head
Indicate where pain is - Neck
Indicate where pain is - Muscle
Indicate where pain is - Joint
Indicate where pain is - Other
Subject related information (e.g the affection, phenotype, disease information, etc.).
Site
Study; The code for each individual study
Notes: e.g., the name of the study in multi-grant collections

ElementDescription: Week in level/study
